statements: DELETE FROM routes WHERE route_id = 10 AND distance_km > 100
DELETE FROM routes WHERE fuel_usage < 30 AND start_location = ST_GeogFromText('POINT(37.7749 -122.4194)')
DELETE FROM routes WHERE route_name = 'Route A';
DELETE FROM distances WHERE route_id = 5 AND distance > 100
DELETE FROM routes WHERE route_id IN (SELECT route_id FROM distances WHERE distance < 50)
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 101 AND max_capacity > 50;
DELETE FROM stops WHERE demand < 20 AND capacity < 30;
DELETE FROM traffic_conditions WHERE condition_name = 'Heavy Traffic' AND weather_condition = 'Rainy';
